step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with fists clenched and arms drawn in. Keep those muscles tight as you inhale.
Nicely done opening your hands and extending your arms. Remember to exhale as you relax and open.
Excellent work returning to the starting position with fists clenched. Inhale and tighten your muscles again.
Great job opening your hands and extending your arms horizontally. Exhale and relax your muscles.
You're doing great! Keep up the smooth movements and controlled breathing.
Second rep starting strong! Remember to keep your fists closed and muscles tight as you inhale.
Well done extending your arms and opening your hands. Exhale and relax as you complete this movement.
Returning to the start position with fists clenched. Inhale and tighten your muscles for the next phase.
Excellent extension and opening of the hands. Exhale and relax your muscles fully.
Fantastic job completing the second set! Your movements were controlled and followed the instructions well.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fists tight and muscles engaged as you inhale, then fully open your hands and relax as you exhale. Continue to focus on smooth, controlled movements.
